patthana8.35:1.1_0: Nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.35:1.1_1: Nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.35:1.1_2: Nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacitto ca nanocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.35:2.1_0: Nanocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.35:3.1_0: Nacittañca nanocittañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
